Community Tips

Customize Your Profile with Featured Reviews

In the era of digital prominence, reviews play a crucial role in shaping impressions and showcasing robust reviews is essential in making a positive first impression on potential clients. As a member of Justia Connect Pro, you have the ability to select and highlight reviews from your clients and fellow attorneys, enhancing the visibility of these endorsements on your Justia Lawyer Directory profile.

Justia Webinars

Upcoming Presentations
Effective Time Management for Attorneys

In this webinar, Adam Boyd addresses common pitfalls attorneys face in converting leads, particularly in client consultations. He explores the reasons behind poor outcomes, such as misunderstandings or missed opportunities, stemming from critical mistakes in communication. Boyd outlines conversational structures that help align expectations, facilitating mutual qualification, information exchange, and a clear understanding of the client-attorney relationship.

Additionally, he provides best practices for handling potential clients, aiming to improve reviews, even with those who ultimately choose not to engage the attorney.

Register Now
Empowering Women in Family Law: Strategies for Success

In her upcoming presentation, Anna will thoroughly examine empowerment strategies designed specifically for women in the field of family law. She will address the unique challenges and opportunities faced by women in this practice area, offering insights into effective strategies for overcoming obstacles, advancing in one's career, and fostering inclusivity in a field traditionally dominated by men.

Register Now

Recent Recordings
Effective Time Management for Attorneys

With our recent presentation, you may explore strategies for improving time management to enhance efficiency, productivity, and financial gains, while also prioritizing mental well-being. As legal professionals, our time is invaluable and must be safeguarded, recognizing its irreplaceable nature. The webinar will offer practical, immediately applicable time management advice to optimize professional performance.

Watch Now
Effective Time Management for Attorneys

Video has established itself as a powerful digital tool capable of highlighting a firm's personnel, skill sets, industry insights, and expertise. Its versatility extends not only across various channels but also allows for repurposing across different outlets. This On-Demand seminar aims to guide you through the rationale behind and the strategic planning of a video strategy, providing practical insights to assist law firms in developing or initiating a sustainable, long-term video strategy. Join this session with Robert Weiss to understand, assess, and ascertain how video aligns with and best serves the unique requirements of your firm.

Legal Deals

Established by Thomson Reuters Elite Online Solutions in 1999 and later becoming privately owned in 2006, TimeSolv has risen to prominence as the foremost solution for time and expense tracking, billing, and management requirements for global businesses. Currently, thousands of professionals across diverse industries, including legal, technology, engineering, health, marketing, design, and advertising, rely on TimeSolv products. Get 15% off the monthly TimeSolv subscription price for the first 24 months of consecutive service with promo code “justiaconnect” during signup.
